member.name: T:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Dialog
member.summary: The Dialog class contains methods that return urls of Facebook dialogs

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Dialog.GetAddFriendDialogUrl(System.String,System.String,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.DialogDisplayType,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a url that prompts the user to add a friend. If the opposite side has already sent a friend request, this dialog prompts the user to confirm the friend request.
member.param: Facebook Application ID
An address relative where users will be redirected to this address after the dialog.
How the dialog page is intended to be displayed.
The UserID or Username of whom to be added as friend
member.returns: A Url to redirect the user to add another user as a friend

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Dialog.GetAddPageTabUrl(System.String,System.String,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.DialogDisplayType)
member.summary: Gets the url that prompts the user to add a Page Tab
member.param: Facebook Application ID
Address which the user will be redirected to after the dialog
Display mode of the dialog

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Dialog.GetAppRequestUrl(System.String,System.String,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.DialogDisplayType,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.AppRequestFilter,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the url that prompts the user to send application requests
member.param: Facebook Application ID
The message the receiving user will see. Must not exceed 255 characters

A user ID or username who must be a friend of the sender. If this is specified, the user will not have a choice of recipients. If this is omitted, the user will see a friend selector and will be able to select a maximum of 50 recipients.
Specifies which users will appear in the friend selector
An address where users will be redirected to this address after the dialog.
How the dialog page is intended to be displayed.
The title of the friend selector. Must not exceed 50 characters.
Tracking Data which is stored in the AppRequest object on Facebook.
member.returns: A url the user can be redirected to send application requests

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Dialog.GetFeedDialogUrl(System.String,System.String,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.DialogDisplayType,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Models.LinkAttachment,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Models.PostAction)
member.summary: Gets the url that prompts the user to post to the wall
member.param: Facebook Application ID
An address where users will be redirected to this address after the dialog.
The ID or username of the user posting the message. If unspecified, default is current user. If specified, must be ID of the user or of a page that the user administers.
The ID or username of the profile that this story will be published to. If unspecified, default is the value of PosterID
The Url to a picture attached to this post.
The Url to a media file (e.g. SWF or video file) attached to this post. If both source and picture are specified, only source is used.
A Link Attachment to this post.
An action link that appears next to "Comment" and "Like".
How the dialog page is intended to be displayed.
member.returns: A url where the user can be redirected to post something on the wall

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Dialog.GetSendDialogUrl(System.String,System.String,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.DialogDisplayType,System.String,System.String,ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Models.LinkAttachment)
member.summary: Gets a url that prompts the user to send a message
member.param: Facebook Application ID
An address where users will be redirected to this address after the dialog.
How the dialog page is intended to be displayed.
A UserID or Username to which to send the message
The Url of the picture that is displayed next to the link, if a link is provided. If unspecified, a picture will be automatically picked by Facebook and displayed next to the link.
A link attached to this message. Note that the Caption property of the LinkAttachment object is ignored.
member.returns: A url the user can be redirected to send a message

member.summary: The Access Token is invalid because the user has logged out.

member.summary: The Access Token is invalid because it has expired.
